oai_dc:dc.dc:title: President and Mrs. Lyndon Johnson at the Hermitage
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: President and Mrs. Johnson placing a wreath at the tomb of President Andrew Jackson while visiting Nashville to participate in the celebration of the 200th anniversary observance of President Jackson's birthday. 3 x 4 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Johnson, Lyndon; Johnson, Lady Bird; Ellington, Gov. Buford; Ellington, Mrs.
Nashville (Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Metro Photographer
